thread.title: David Beckham smashes his tooth falling off snowboard
thread.title_full: David Beckham smashes his tooth falling off snowboard

title: David Beckham smashes his tooth falling off snowboard
text: Share this article Share Brooklyn Beckham was pictured with his arm in a sling after breaking his collarbone in a snowboarding accident The video shows the oldest son of former England football captain David whizzing down the slopes in Whistler, Canada The video shows the oldest son of former England football captain David whizzing down the slopes. The 17-year-old heads down a run, skimming close to a small woodland drop at the edge of the piste and also going over a couple of small jumps. But it is on a wide, tamer-looking part of the slope where the accident happened, as the nose of his board gets caught in the snow and he tumbles over, throwing up a huge cloud of powder. Hours later after an undoubtedly painful time in hospital, he shared an image of his X-Ray, displaying his collar bone ripped apart, putting him out of action for the rest of the trip. The video, which was viewed almost 400,000 times in the first four hours, was simply uploaded with the caption 'Broke my collarbone at the end.'
